text: Marma may refer to: * Marma people, an ethnic Arakanese group in Bangladesh * Marma language, of Bangladesh * Marma (spider), a genus of spiders * Marma (film), a 2002 Indian film * Marma, Sweden, a town in Sweden * Marma, Dhanbad, a town in India * Marma (Ayurveda), in Ayurveda, a pressure point on the body Category:Language and nationality disambiguation pages
title: Marma
